sentences.en: I want to go by ropeway.
Notes: The magic carpet ticket may not include ropeway and suface lift.
sentences.cn: 备注: 魔毯票只供乘坐魔毯,不能乘坐缆车及拖牵.

sentences.en: Reliable traveling of rope as the carrying and towing equipment is necessary to ropeway safe operation.
sentences.cn: 作为索道的承重牵引设备钢丝绳的运行可靠性是索道安全运行的基本保证.

sentences.en: The conclusion is the improper design caused the failure of hanger of ropeway.
sentences.cn: 通过综合分析可以看出结构设计不合理导致了索道吊架的失效.

sentences.en: The ropeway with the do line combination of beauty, together constitute a beautiful and spectacular picture.
sentences.cn: 该索道与天坑美景结合起来, 共同构成了一幅优美而壮观的画卷.

sentences.en: Worker in a desert ropeway . West Inner Mongolia.
sentences.cn: 腾格里沙漠金沙景区中看护沙漠索道的工人.

phrases.tran_cn: 高架索道；架空索道；架空死
